original_text: Truly, I say to you, whoever says to this mountain, ‘Be taken up and thrown into the sea,’ and does not doubt in his heart, but believes that what he says will come to pass, it will be done for him.
korean_text: 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 누구든지 이 산더러 들리어 바다에 던져지라 하며 그 말하는 것이 이루어질 줄 믿고 마음에 의심하지 아니하면 그대로 되리라

sentences.original_text: ‘Be taken up and thrown into the sea,’
and does not doubt in his heart,
but believes that what he says will come to pass,
sentences.korean_translation: 자기의 하는 말이 이루질 줄 믿으면,

sentences.original_text: it will be done for him.
